fr.upem.jShell.JShellServer

Class IndexVerticle

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractVerticle
      • fr.upem.jShell.JShellServer.IndexVerticle

  • public class IndexVerticle
extends AbstractVerticle
    Retrieves and stores the index of the exercises. Uses the Observer Pattern in order to retrieve the when it's changed on the disk. If there are no changes it returns the stored index.
    Author:
    mattia

      EventBus address to get the index
